key.name: object-iid
key.description: The implementation ID of the object - e.g. "ClockAppletFactory::ClockApplet".

key.name: toplevel-id
key.description: The identifier of the toplevel panel which contains this object.

key.name: position
key.description: The position of this panel object. The position is specified by the number of pixels from the left (or top if vertical) panel edge.

key.name: pack
key.summary: Interpret position relative to bottom/right edge
key.description: If set to 'end', the position of the object is interpreted relative to the right (or bottom if vertical) edge of the panel.
